meanings.definition: Work assigned to students in a class.
meanings.sent1: Completing my classworks helps me understand the lessons better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out the classworks for us to do at home.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my classworks at school, so I had to rush back to get them.
meanings.sent4: Her classworks were like pieces of a puzzle, each one contributing to her overall understanding.
meanings.sent5: The stack of classworks on my desk seemed never-ending, but I tackled them one by one.

meanings.definition: The collective body of work produced by a class of students.
meanings.sent1: The classworks displayed in the hallway showcased the students' creativity.
meanings.sent2: At the end of the semester, we presented our classworks to the school.
meanings.sent3: The classworks from the art class were so impressive that they were featured in the local newspaper.
meanings.sent4: Each student's classworks were like a unique piece in a beautiful mosaic of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The classworks exhibition was a testament to the hard work and talent of the students.
